description:
Haruna Sakurada is the junior high school teacher of Usagi Tsukino.
She acts very young for her age, however her personality does change slightly. She has long, brown hair, and can be quite strict, especially when it comes to Usagi mucking things up with her laziness. However, she is also lovesick and obsessed with finding a husband, which makes her an easy target for the Dark Kingdom during the first series.
name: Sakurada Haruna
